Description: A crocodile; walking to right; on verso a view of Alexandria harbour with the lighthouse and a smaller, cruder woodcut of the lighthouse only, both by anonymous printmakers; illustrations to the Latin edition of Sebastian Münster, 'Cosmographia', Basle: Heinrich Petri, 1552. c.1550 Woodcut and letterpress
Producer name: Print made by: Hans Rudolf Manuel
Curator's comments: See Curatorial Comment for 1850,1014.960. For another impression of the crocodile and a fragment of Alexandria harbour, see 1850,0612.400.
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (German) / The New Hollstein: German engravings, etchings and woodcuts 1400-1700 (119)
